entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Parent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:51 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parent 10:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

Humidity: 94 %

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 30 to 40 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 50 gusting to 80 this morning then diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
